name: Sasso Rosa
description:
This Is my first game jam, i've created an hybrid game, platform and other minigames are a click away!

Attributions:

Music: Abstraction - Ludum Dare 28 Loops from Itch.io, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TBD2nKx7gI4, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cGufy1PAeTU.

Assets: Me, https://pixel-frog.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1 Pixel Adventure 1, freepik.

Game engine: Construct 2

Updates to the game are incoming!

This game is for the weekly game jam 148, the theme of this Jam is "Mirror"

I don't speak english very well, if you found in the game or in the description an error please notify me with a comment.
